doc.goal: How can I get the marker stain out of my t shirt?
doc.sol1: Run it under cold water with a bar of soap. Then use stain remover on it before putting it in the laundry machine.
doc.sol2: Run it under cold water with a bar of soap. Then use stain remover on it before putting it in the dryer.
